title: 225: Why Does Jake Maynard Think My S.W.E.A.T. Pledge is Bonkers?
itunes:title: Why Does Jake Maynard Think My S.W.E.A.T. Pledge is Bonkers?
description: Mike interviews Chloe Hudson, a 28-year-old welder who received a work ethic scholarship from mikeroweWORKS, and went on to earn six-figures a year, and more recently, the subject of a new documentary called Trading Up. Together, they unpack The S.W.E.A.T. Pledge, and try to determine why a writer named Jake Maynard thinks it’s “bonkers.”
itunes:author: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
dc:creator: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
